meanings: Adverb in an instant, in a flash
(잠깐) in an instant, in a flash, (문득) by chance, by accident, unexpectedly

meanings.meaning: catch[get, have, obtain] a glimpse of

vlive.korean: 얼핏 보면 엄지 척하고 있는 거 같죠? In a way, it looks like it has its thumb up, right? 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : 우즈의 [EQUAL] ALBUM UNBOXING 💙
vlive.english: In a way, it looks like it has its thumb up, right?

vlive.korean: 멋있는 분이, 멋있는 분이 함께해주신다고 얼핏 들었어요 - 얼마나 멋있어요? I heard someone cool will be with us. - How cool is this person? 듣기 View video NCT : 또욘드👊
vlive.english: I heard someone cool will be with us. - How cool is this person?

vlive.korean: [무서워 얼핏 보면 주술 의식 같기도...] [주술사 슬리피] 오케이. [Sort of looks like magic spell] Okay. 듣기 View video 세이브펫챌린지 SAVE PET CHALLENGE : 슬리피! 검은개 프로젝트 투견 포미를 위한 세펫챌 도전! [세이브펫챌린지] 16회
vlive.english: [Sort of looks like magic spell] Okay.

vlive.korean: 얼핏 유승우 닮았다고요? I look like Yoo Seung-woo? 듣기 View video Park Si Hwan : 광주====>서울
제가 노래를 얼핏 들어봤거든요. I heard the songs briefly. 듣기 View video BTOB : <이민혁 'Purple Rain' 런칭 전야제>

examples.korean: Imagine my horror when Mr. Chin took one look at my proposal and burst out laughing. 발음듣기 Chin 씨가 제 제안서를 얼핏 보고 웃음을 터뜨리셨을 때의 제 공포를 상상해 보십시오. DARAKWON
examples.english: Imagine my horror when Mr. Chin took one look at my proposal and burst out laughing. 발음

examples.korean: I caught sight of the lake below. 발음듣기 나는 아래쪽 호수를 얼핏 보았다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I caught sight of the lake below. 발음

examples.korean: How could you tell the difference at a glance? 발음듣기 얼핏 보고 차이점을 어떻게 알 수 있겠니? Neungyule
examples.english: How could you tell the difference at a glance? 발음

examples.korean: I only caught a glimpse of the thief before he ran away. 발음듣기 난 그 도둑이 도망치기 전에 얼핏 보았을 뿐이다. Neungyule
examples.english: I only caught a glimpse of the thief before he ran away. 발음

examples.korean: His apparent meekness deceives everyone. 발음듣기 그는 얼핏 얌전해 보이므로 모두가 속는다((그렇게 생각한다)). Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His apparent meekness deceives everyone. 발음
